title: Instagram Multi-Scraper Input
description: Configure the Instagram scraper based on your needs

scraperType.title: Scraper Type
scraperType.description: Choose the type of Instagram data to scrape

profileUrl.title: Profile URL or Username
profileUrl.description: Instagram profile URL or username (e.g., 'username' or 'https://instagram.com/username'). Required for: Profile, Reels, Mentions, Quick Posts scrapers.

hashtag.title: Hashtag
hashtag.description: Hashtag to scrape without the # symbol (e.g., 'travel'). Required for: Hashtag, Hashtag Stats scrapers.

postUrl.title: Post URL
postUrl.description: Full Instagram post or reel URL. Required for: Post, Comments scrapers.

usernames.title: Usernames List
usernames.description: List of usernames for bulk followers count check. Required for: Followers Count scraper. Enter one username per line.

limit.title: Results Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to scrape (used for scrapers that return multiple results)

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for avoiding rate limits (recommended for production use)
